definition: زلق zaliqa a (zalaq) and zalaqa u (zalq) to glide, slide; to slip II to make slippery (هـ s.th.); to slip, glide (في هـ s.th. into) IV to cause (ه s.o.) to slip │ ازلقه ببصره (bi-baṣarihī) to look at s.o. sternly or disapprovingly V and VII to glide, slide; to skid, slither, slide (الى into s.th.), to slip; to ski; to skate │ انزلق على الثلج (talj) 380 to ski; to skate VII to slip from s.o.’s (عن) hand, from s.th. (عن) زلق zaliq slippery
